general: You are enough, exactly as you are.
Your feelings deserve to be heard and honored.
You bring good into the world simply by being in it.
Your movement tells a story only you can tell.
Progress in dance is not about perfection, it's about expression.
Your body is strong, capable, and uniquely yours.
You are allowed to slow down when things feel heavy.
You don’t have to figure everything out today.
One small step is still progress.
You matter more than you know.
You deserve kindness... including from yourself.
You are worthy of love, rest, and joy.
I am confident in my unique talent and journey
I am capable of achieving my goals
I am my only competition, and I wish to grow into a better dancer everyday
I am not afraid to make mistakes; they help me learn and grow
I am strong enough to keep going, even when I am disappointed
I am brave enough to push past my fears
The more I practice, the less afraid I feel
I dance with joy, passion, and freedom
I will perform with confidence and let my heart speak
I honor my body and give it the care it deserves
I am grateful for my body
I am becoming stronger every day
I will be patient with myself and learn at my own pace
The comeback is always stronger than the setback
I embrace challenges as opportunities to grow
I am in control of my own energy and mood
I am enough, and I have enough for my next best step
I am smart enough to learn from my mistakes.
Only I can determine my mood.
I will not be distracted by what’s not meant for me.
